flavor: Your scars and battered features tell your tale. You have known little more than abuse and hardship in your life, your bones broken, your spirit tested, as you toiled for cruel masters. What sort of work did you do? Were you a common laborer, or did you fight in the arenas? Why were you targeted for so much abuse? Were you insubordinate, or did you suffer under a tyrannical master? How did you escape your tormentors?
name: Broken, Beaten, Scarred
